name: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
For more than 10 years we design and develop highly available, durable and scalable applications for the most demanding requirements.

Currently, we are looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join our friendly RichBrains team!

A Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) will be responsible for ensuring the reliability, availability, and performance of a company's software systems and infrastructure. You will also work closely with software developers to design and implement systems that are easy to deploy and maintain, as well as to provide feedback and insights into system design and architecture.


The SRE is responsible for:

  • Collaborating with development teams to identify and resolve issues that impact the reliability and performance of our web applications.

  • Developing and maintaining monitoring and alerting systems to detect and respond to issues in real-time.

  • Participating in the development of disaster recovery and business continuity plans.

  • Analysing and optimising the performance of our web applications to ensure maximum scalability and availability.

  • Identifying and implementing security and compliance policies to protect our web applications from potential threats.

  • Continuously researching and evaluating new tools and technologies to improve the reliability and performance of our web applications.

Requirements:

  • Experience with monitoring and alerting tools.
  • Strong knowledge of web application architecture and technologies .
  • Familiarity with web application security and compliance standards.
  • Experience with scripting languages such as Python, Ruby, or Bash or other.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • English (strong reading and writing skills)

As a member of our team, you will enjoy:

  • Collaborating with a motivated and highly professional team

  • Performance review

  • Lack of bureaucracy

  • A modern business center located in Minsk, just a five-minute walk from the subway, or the option to work remotely

  • A flexible working schedule from 11:00 - 20:00 Minsk time, with remote work options

  • Regular corporate events to foster team spirit

  • Fresh fruits available in the office for a healthy work environment


    Join us!
